title: Pork belly with apple sauce, kale and carrots
description: Slow-cooked pork belly is a flavoursome crowd pleaser. Great for a Sunday lunch or dinner with friends.
ingredients: 3kg/6lb 8oz piece of pork belly, ribs removed, excess fat removed, tied into a roll.
freshly ground black pepper, to taste
2 apples, preferably Bramley, peeled, cored and chopped
2 bunch baby heritage carrots, trimmed and washed
